def reverse_factorial(num):
    n = 1
    f = 1
    while f < num:
        n += 1
        f = f * n
    return f"{n}!" if f == num else "None"

def reverse_factorial(num):
    i = 1
    while num > 1:
        i += 1
        if num % i != 0: return 'None'
        num //= i
    return f"{i}!" if num == 1 else 'None'

def reverse_factorial(num):
    i = 1
    while 1:
        num, m = num / i, num % i
        if m != 0: return 'None'
        if num == 1: return str(i)+'!'
        i += 1
